reviewText: Like all the Max and Ruby films this is another hit with my grandchildren.  And, I enjoy them as well.  Cute, funny, and clever.
Title: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas

reviewText: My three kids (ages 3, 2, and 11 mo) have the entire Max and Ruby collection, and they never, ever tire of watching them. My husband and I are also not opposed to sitting down and watching them either. There is something so innocent and old-fashioned about the whole series and there is absolutely nothing offensive or objectionable about them.
Title: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas

reviewText: Twelfve episodes of Max and Ruby including two specifically devoted to christmas. Max and Ruby are brother and sister rabbits who live in a human's house and act like humans. Max, Ruby, Grandma and their friends are wonderful alter-ego characters for young children especially pre-schoolers.No violence. No insults. No adult jokes. No politics. These are much better than most adult programs. Obviously, these are broadcast on Nick Jr, a sub-channel of Nickelodeon and Nickelodeon is head and shoulders above or beyond Sesame Street. Nick knows how to educae and entertain children. Nick communicates to children as children communicate with each other.Each of the twelfve episodes are approximately 10 - 11 minutes and the total running time is 97 minutes. I highly recommend this disc and all the Max and Ruby discs. You must buy this and the others because your children will endlessly watch them. Kudoes to Nickelodeon for producing Max and Ruby. Hooray for Max and Ruby. They are bunnylicious.
Title: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas

reviewText: Purchased this for my 2 year old (at the time) grandson, he loves it, his parents don't but he does.  He wants to watch it over and over, it's a fairly long video and goes from one episode into the next so it keeps him entertained well.  His cousins like Max & Ruby on Nick so I figured he would also.
Title: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas

reviewText: Each episode is delightful, and heart felt. Max is the typical busy toddler! He is in search of adventure,and he has many ideas! He is constantly keeping his sister, Ruby, on her toes.This DVD has a good share of holiday fare,along with regular episodes. It is sure to spark holiday cheer, without being too long of duration.  This keeps small children occupied.The minuses are small, with little extras,and no closed captioning.
summary: Best Kid's Shows, For The Little Ones, or Anyone!
Title: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas

reviewText: The Max and Ruby books and dvd's are wonderful. My kids and I have been enjoying this series since they were little and they still love them today.
Title: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas

reviewText: Purchased this DVD as an addition to our daughters movie collection. She loves Max and Ruby, and the christmas theme of this DVD helped us get her into the christmas spirit. Super fast shipping, super low price.
summary: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas DVD
Title: Max & Ruby - A Merry Bunny Christmas
